text:
Hello! I'm not sure if this is the right branch, but I really need your help with this question... Is this possible to automatically update lifecycle stages backwards? (e.g. sql to mql, mql to subscriber)"

I have integrations that were supposed to update the lifecycle stages automatically, but every time they occur the contact with a 'higher' stage then they are meant to set - they just don't do it. So I assume it's a stage lock on the HubSpot side, tried googling and asking support, so that's how I've ended up here.

Would highly appreciate any help with this issue.

It is a lock, HubSpot won't let you go backwards on the Lifecycle Stage.

You'll need to clear the value first before setting the new value.

Hey everyone,

Just following up on my previous post regarding the issue with tracking Google and Facebook leads after the recent API shift. We haven't received any feedback yet and would really appreciate your insights or suggestions on how to resolve this. Has anyone else faced similar issues or found a workaround?

Thanks in advance for your help!
